channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Mets Owner Steve Cohen to Stop Trading For His Hedge Fund
item.description: The billionaire plans to remain at the firm and focus on strategy and mentoring.

item.title: The unemployment measure you’ve never heard is flashing a recession warning
item.description: It may be a puzzle as to why the Fed is cutting at all when the economy is far from recession. One indicator suggests an answer.

item.title: JPMorgan in Talks With Apple to Take Over Credit Card From Goldman
item.description: JPMorgan could become the new Apple credit-card issuer, but is seeking concessions from the tech company.

item.title: ‘He has never paid rent or utilities:’ Do I have the legal and moral authority to charge my brother rent to live in our family home?
item.description: ‘My brother has been living there while my father was alive — and still is. He did not pay any rent or utilities’

item.title: The Battle Brewing Over Blood Tests for Cancer
item.description: Positive results of a colon cancer study conducted by Exact Sciences prompt the CEO of competitor Guardant Health to publicly challenge his rival to a...

item.title: An alternative version of the S&P 500 has beaten its more popular sibling back to record highs
item.description: The equal-weight S&P 500 has beaten its more popular sibling in the race back to record highs. That tells us a lot about how U.S. stock-market leaders...

item.title: Kroger Antitrust Case Could Open Up New Bag of M&A Possibilities
item.description: A victory for the Federal Trade Commission, set to conclude Tuesday, could pave the way for an Amazon buying spree.

item.title: 3 ways the Fed interest-rate cut could jump-start buying and selling homes again
item.description: Home buyers and sellers could come off the sidelines after the Fed’s first interest-rate cut since 2020.

item.title: Salesforce Needs to Sell Its Latest AI Vision
item.description: The cloud pioneer hopes AI agents make a splash at its Dreamforce conference and rejuvenate growth prospects.

item.title: JPMorgan in talks with Apple to take over its credit card venture: report
item.description: JPMorgan Chase is in negotiations to take over Apple’s credit card venture from Goldman Sachs after the tech frim made a push to cut its ties with the...
